headline: Circle Roadmap And Intuit Deal Put Focus On Arc And Valuation
summary: Circle Internet Group (NYSE:CRCL) released a 2026 roadmap for its Arc Layer 1 blockchain, outlining plans for broader enterprise and institutional use. The company announced a major partnership with Intuit aimed at integrating stablecoin and blockchain infrastructure into business and consumer financial tools. Circle received conditional federal approval to establish the First National Digital Currency Bank under U.S. oversight. Circle Internet Group, known for USDC and related blockchain...

headline: Intuit Partners with Affirm to Provide Pay-Over-Time Offering for QuickBooks Online
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. & SAN FRANCISCO, February 02, 2026--Intuit (NASDAQ: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, today announced a new, multi-year partnership with Affirm (NASDAQ: AFRM). Under the agreement, Affirm will become the exclusive pay-over-time solution built into QuickBooks Payments,* further strengthening Intuit’s end-to-end financial management capabilities that help accelerate how businesses manage and gr

content.title: Intuit Partners with Affirm to Provide Pay-Over-Time Offering for QuickBooks Online
